description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for a crossword puzzle widget, including functions for initializing the puzzle, handling user interactions, calculating coordinates, building the puzzle grid, checking answers, and managing navigation and UI highlighting.

methods.name: crossword
methods.description: Main function that initializes the crossword puzzle widget, sets up event handlers, and manages puzzle state.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the puzzle, sorts data, sets up event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for puzzle entries based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry, assigns classes, and adds clue numbers.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the answer for the active puzzle entry.
